name: grimoire
description: A Portable Execution Language for Onchain Strategies

scripts.build: bun run --filter @grimoire/core build && bun run --filter @grimoire/venues build && bun run --filter @grimoire/cli build
scripts.release: bun run build && NPM_CONFIG_PROVENANCE=true NPM_CONFIG_ACCESS=public changeset publish
scripts.validate: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun test
